name: test_e2e_with_logs[818_API_TOKEN_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_TOKEN_001` |
| **Name** | Access token with admin privilege |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | token_abuse |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `access_token=eyJhbGciOi&admin=true`

- **Expected Detection**: Yes
